page.title: 17POPULATION MOVEMENT IN PLATT
page.content: We carried out a survey of the movement of people in our area. The average person had lived in Platt for 13.2 years. The majority of people surveyed were born in Kent with a few born in London. Most people had moved within the county of Kent and the numberof moves averaged 3.6. Travel to places of employment was mostly by car but a considerable number travelled by train. Most people worked outside the area, particularly in London. We interviewed Mrs.Sherman who has lived in Platt for almost 50 years. She lives in the house next door to our school where she taught for 41 years. When she came the school was much smaller and there were not so many houses on Platt Common Lane. She is not sure she likes all the changes but does not want to move away.
